Text.Page:
Some of the faculty still haven't been cleansed and are trying to take back the academy. Hunt down the {@LinkCreature:22#19#vadoma witches} and {@LinkCreature:22#20#shadow guides} and put an end to this.

Find Kendea when you're finished.

They had to die. I understand. Our loremaster will immortalize them in our tomes.

No one will forget them.
Have you dealt with the witches and guides yet? If not, you should hurry.
